channel.title: My Site! on Home
channel.description: Recent content in My Site! on Home

item.title: Hi there, I am Cosimo 👋
item.description: I’m completing my Master of Science in Computer Engineering at Politecnico di Torino. Over this last few years, i have dedicated my time to learn everthing i could about Cybersecurity and Cloud Computing, working on many projects.

item.title: Long story short...
item.description: 💻 When I was 16 I built my PC 🎮 At the end of my first year at UniFi, I created a Videogame in C++ 🛠️ Discrete math course blew my mind ♥️ I fell in love with Artificial Intelligence after working on Emotion & Speech Recognition … 🎓 … however, my Bachelor thesis was about Analysis and development of a scalable solution for IOT Broker providing a dashboard for IOT devices ✈️ I moved to Turin and started studying at PoliTo, focusing on Cybersecurity and Cloud Computing 💾 I rebuild the OS161 kernel a standalone kernel and a simple userland, all written in C.
I am a MSc. Student c/o Polytechnic University of Turin 🎓 Graduated with a bachelor degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Florence
